segments.text: Mike , what are you doing tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing special . I just want to get plastered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't feel like drinking tonight . I'm gonna hang out at YY's .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: YY's ? That place is boring . How about Xara's ? It's real classy , and they keep the place spin and span .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but it's expensive . Nah , I'm going to YY's .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On second thought , I think I'll join you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They ' Ve just renovated the place . You may be surprised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , they really went to town on this place !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure is . Waiter , bring us two drafts , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When in Rome , do as the Romans do .
segments.speaker: S2
